about_the_game:
It's dinner time and these kitties are HUNGRY! In this Match 3 game you'll be swiping up down left and right to line up kibble bits to fill up your favorite kitty's bowl till they're full! But act fast–the clock is ticking! Conquer challenging levels and unlock game-changing bonus stages using unique power-ups to unlock 1000 new cats and accessorize your favorites in The Lounge--a separate mode which allows you to fully customize your feline-friendly humble abode!

ABOUT:

Chowdown Kitty is a cozy Match 3 game where you line up tiles of treats to feed and unlock an adorable CAT-alogue of kitties and dress them up in cute accessories and toys!

Dozens of levels!
Wind down your evenings with your favorite cat by your side, but make sure their bowl is full or things might get hairy! Feed your kitty by matching treats to clear each level and move on to the next stage!

Addictive Gameplay
Match 3 tiles to fill up your Kitty’s dinner bowl but you’d better have cat-like reflexes because the clock is ticking down! Challenge yourself in bonus stages to rack up a high score using special power-ups!

Hundreds of Kittens to Unlock in The Lounge!
Complete levels and score points to unlock different cats to add to your collection! Dress them up with fun hats and accessories to truly make them your own! Then show them off in The Lounge, where your cats will nap, play, and feast in a totally customizable playground for your feline friends!

name: Chowdown Kitty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
